From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The slash of Cledar did little more than knock one of the heads to the
side. Sinnertwin was moving in for the kill now. Little did he know that
the pods were coming at him. They burst behind him, and sent him forward
onto Cledar. He lashed out with one head at Cledar, as the other looked
behind him at his charred back armour.
